description.en: Shinji gets amnesia, and everyone uses this to their advantage. Especially Rei ^_^

biography.en:
Homunculus (ホムンクルス) is one of the top hentai artists in the industry. His first two books, Bashful Break and [Renai Sample](https://mangadex.org/title/08e99300-47ac-496e-8695-3f05c7ebceea/), have both reached several top-selling tankōbon lists in Japan. Homunculus is part of the doujinshi circle Undercover Brothers alongside their friend [Sugaishi](https://mangadex.org/author/ad0fcc86-8408-4265-ac15-1ab2557dabac/).

Homunculus made his first appearance in the July 2009 issue of Comic Kairakuten with his debut work "Training Days". Comic Kairakuten's been publishing his works from time to time since then.

### Alternative Names:
* ホムンクルス

### Circles:
* Undercover Brothers

### Trackers:
* [AniList](https://anilist.co/staff/107354/)
* [MangaUpdates](https://www.mangaupdates.com/author/n74zqxb/)
* [MyAnimeList](https://myanimelist.net/people/12354/)
